response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only offers unparalleled functionality but also boasts a unique aesthetic that reflects sophistication and innovation. We believe its value extends far beyond its monetary worth, making it an invaluable addition to any collection. Given its rarity and quality, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece for $12,000. This price reflects its true value and the investment it represents. We're confident that once you experience its excellence, you'll agree that this is a remarkable deal. Let's make this extraordinary piece yours today.", "product_price": 12000}
